SELECT GM.GPU_MANUFACTURER_IDX , GM.GPU_MANUFACTURER_NAME , GC.GPU_CHIPSET_IDX , GC.GPU_CHIPSET_NAME , GMP.GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS_IDX , GMP.GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS
FROM GPU_MANUFACTURER GM JOIN GPU_CHIPSET GC ON GM.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = GC.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS GMP ON GC.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = GMP.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX

SELECT GPU_IDX, GPU_NAME, (SELECT GM.GPU_MANUFACTURER_NAME FROM GPU_MANUFACTURER GM WHERE GM.GPU_MANUFACTURER_IDX = G.GPU_MANUFACTURER_IDX) AS GPU_MANUFACTURER_NAME, (SELECT GC.GPU_CHIPSET_NAME FROM GPU_CHIPSET GC WHERE GC.GPU_CHIPSET_IDX = G.GPU_CHIPSET_IDX) AS GPU_CHIPSET_NAME, (SELECT GMP.GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS FROM GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS GMP WHERE GMP.GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS_IDX = G.GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS_IDX) AS GPU_MANUFACTURING_PROCESS, (SELECT GM.MEMORY_SIZE FROM GPU_MEMORY GM WHERE GM.GPU_MEMORY_IDX = G.GPU_MEMORY_IDX) AS GPU_MEMORY_SIZE, (SELECT GT.MEMORY_TYPE FROM GPU_MEMORY_TYPE GT WHERE GT.GPU_MEMORY_TYPE_IDX = G.GPU_MEMORY_TYPE_IDX) AS GPU_MEMORY_TYPE, (SELECT GC.CORE_COUNT FROM GPU_CORE GC WHERE GC.GPU_CORE_IDX = G.GPU_CORE_IDX) AS GPU_CORE_COUNT, (SELECT BC.BASE_CLOCK FROM GPU_BASE_CLOCK BC WHERE BC.GPU_BASE_CLOCK_IDX = G.GPU_BASE_CLOCK_IDX) AS GPU_BASE_CLOCK, (SELECT BO.BOOST_CLOCK FROM GPU_BOOST_CLOCK BO WHERE BO.GPU_BOOST_CLOCK_IDX = G.GPU_BOOST_CLOCK_IDX) AS GPU_BOOST_CLOCK, (SELECT P.GPU_RECOMMENDED_POWER FROM GPU_POWER P WHERE P.GPU_POWER_IDX = G.GPU_POWER_IDX) AS GPU_RECOMMENDED_POWER, (SELECT CM.COOLING_METHOD FROM GPU_COOLING_METHOD CM WHERE CM.GPU_COOLING_METHOD_IDX = G.GPU_COOLING_METHOD_IDX) AS GPU_COOLING_METHOD, (SELECT FC.FAN_COUNT FROM GPU_FAN_COUNT FC WHERE FC.GPU_FAN_COUNT_IDX = G.GPU_FAN_COUNT_IDX) AS GPU_FAN_COUNT, (SELECT W.WIDTH FROM GPU_WIDTH W WHERE W.GPU_WIDTH_IDX = G.GPU_WIDTH_IDX) AS GPU_WIDTH, (SELECT H.HEIGHT_VALUE FROM GPU_HEIGHT H WHERE H.GPU_HEIGHT_IDX = G.GPU_HEIGHT_IDX) AS GPU_HEIGHT, (SELECT T.THICKNESS FROM GPU_THICKNESS T WHERE T.GPU_THICKNESS_IDX = G.GPU_THICKNESS_IDX) AS GPU_THICKNESS, GPU_RELEASE_DATE, GPU_ORIGIN_PRICE, GPU_NOW_PRICE, COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX, (SELECT GI.GPU_SFILE_NAME FROM GPU_IMAGE GI WHERE G.GPU_IDX = GI.GPU_IDX) FROM GPU G
